item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: It’s a big, wonderful, dangerous, and important world out there… but today, I am really excited for just one comparatively little, relatively short, but singularly important thing that will hopefully happen tomorrow.
item.content:encoded: It’s a big, wonderful, dangerous, and important world out there… but today, I am really excited for just one comparatively little, relatively short, but singularly important thing that will hopefully happen tomorrow.

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: If you’re “paying” attention to something, you ought to be getting value in the exchange.
item.content:encoded: If you’re “paying” attention to something, you ought to be getting value in the exchange.

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: 11⁄10 times the problem is user input error
item.content:encoded: 11⁄10 times the problem is user input error

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: I sometimes see birds walking and think they must not be very excited about wherever it is they’re going.
item.content:encoded: I sometimes see birds walking and think they must not be very excited about wherever it is they’re going.

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: RT if you also have a git branch named “0v”
item.content:encoded: RT if you also have a git branch named “0v”

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: What I really want out of face-recognition technology is software that blanks my screen if it detects a face other than my own looking at it. Instead, I get Animojis. Glad we’ve got our priorities straight.
item.content:encoded: What I really want out of face-recognition technology is software that blanks my screen if it detects a face other than my own looking at it. Instead, I get Animojis. Glad we’ve got our priorities straight.

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: Debugging practice challenge: When you have three VSC windows open and you sneeze and accidentally press a key and you can’t tell which pane had focus.
item.content:encoded: Debugging practice challenge: When you have three VSC windows open and you sneeze and accidentally press a key and you can’t tell which pane had focus.

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: I’m not that hard to please. I see proper error handling, I am HTTP 200.
item.content:encoded: I’m not that hard to please. I see proper error handling, I am HTTP 200.

item.description: A computer without an Internet connection is just an empty shell.
